response.original_title: Miracle Boy: The Dave Mirra Story
response.overview: We’re excited to announce that the documentary “Miracle Boy”: The Dave Mirra Story is in development. Dave Mirra was more than just a BMX legend - he was a cultural icon who changed the face of action sports forever. His life was filled with triumphs and tragedies, and his legacy continues to inspire people worldwide to pursue their dreams. The film will be Produced by Gratis 7 Production, Directed by T.C. Johnstone. More information is to come here on Dave's site, or if you would like to sign up for the Gratis 7 Production newsletter, subscribe here.
response.title: Miracle Boy: The Dave Mirra Story
